name: obsidian-calendar-view-plugin
description: Modern calendar view plugin for Obsidian - display notes by date with event colors, recurring events, search, and more

scripts.build: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: cp main.js deployment/ && cp styles.css deployment/ && cp manifest.json deployment/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Waschtlgrea
